english.segment2: Some hope in what their eyes can see, We hope in the Glorious unseen--. In a risen and returning King. Some are chasing the treasures of this world, We run to a Glorious reward, The only name worth living for. Say! Say!
english.segment3: Say, Say, Say you believe it. Sing for the whole world to hear it. We know and we declare it. Jesus is King. Say, say, say you believe it. Sing loud, sing like you mean it. We know and we declare it. Jesus is King. Say! Say!
english.segment5: We set our hearts on what will last, Your Word, Your Love, Your Faithfulness, Our hope is built on nothing less. We open wide our mouths to praise. Let this generation raise. A song of freedom all our days. C'mon, Say! Say!
english.segment6: Say, Say, Say you believe it. Sing for the whole world to hear it. We know and we declare it. Jesus is King. Say, say, say you believe it. Sing loud, sing like you mean it. We know and we declare it. Jesus is King. Say! Say!
english.segment7: Sing it! Say, "I believe,". (I believe). "Your Kingdom come". (Your Kingdom come). "Son of God". (Son of God). "The King of Love". (The King of Love). Everyone, Say, "I believe". (I believe). "Your Kingdom come". (Your Kingdom come). "Son of God". (Son of God). "The King of Love". (The King of Love)
english.segment8: Say, Say, Say you believe it. Sing for the whole world to hear it. We know and we declare it. Jesus is King. Say, say, say you believe it. Sing loud, sing like you mean it. We know and we declare it. Jesus is King. Say! Say!
